title: JavaScript / jQuery HTML DOM

metadata.description: Learn about JavaScript / jQuery HTML DOM with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
jQuery vs JavaScript
jQuery
was created in 2006 by John Resig. 
It was designed to handle Browser Incompatibilities and to simplify HTML DOM Manipulation, Event Handling, Animations, and Ajax.
For more than 10 years, jQuery has been the most popular JavaScript library in the world.
However, after JavaScript
Version 5
(2009), most of the jQuery utilities can be solved with a few lines of standard JavaScript:
Removing HTML Elements
Remove an HTML element:
jQuery
$("#id02").remove();

JavaScript
document.getElementById("id02").remove();

Get Parent Element
Return the parent of an HTML element:
jQuery
myParent = $("#02").parent().prop("nodeName"); ;

JavaScript
myParent = document.getElementById("02").parentNode.nodeName;

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers JavaScript / jQuery HTML DOM concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use JavaScript / jQuery HTML DOM effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of JavaScript / jQuery HTML DOM and how to apply it in your projects.
